author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

The source lock was not being taken during the doBeginRun/doBeginLumi calls to the source. The caused issues when a Run/Lumi transition coincided with a delayed read call.

This was uncovered by the problem https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/48171.

#### PR validation:

The code compiles and framework unit tests pass.

resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1425
title: Properly lock source for Run/Lumi transition
